ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Quests Expanded - Ancients
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson, Taranchuk, Ferny
ModMetaData.description:
They tried to improve the human body. Instead, they changed it into something unrecognizable. Vanilla Quests Expanded: Ancients sends you into subterranean vaults where abandoned archite machines still twist flesh and fate, reshaping anything that falls into their grasp.
Search the remnants of a civilization obsessed with perfection. Steal their genetic engines, unlock archite mutation chambers, and experiment with power that bends biology itself. Unlock the truth. Escape the corruption.
Vanilla Quests Expanded: Ancients — what will you become?
